author: esammer
msg: - No longer interrupt the caller of ChannelDriverThread if it's interrupted. - Upgraded the level of a sink open log event from debug to error on intr.

author: esammer
msg: - Log interrupts received while cleaning up during exceptions.

author: esammer
msg: - ChannelDriver now properly exposes any exceptions that occur while running. - Added javadoc including blocking and interrupt semantics.

author: esammer
msg: - Updated TestFlumeNode to pull in AbstractLogicalNodeManager from its new package.
